metadata.name: Hardware Model Reconnaissance Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of WMIC with the "csproduct" which is used to obtain information such as hardware models and vendor information

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('csproduct')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of WMIC with the "csproduct" which is used to obtain information such as hardware models and vendor information
